code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{TextField,Button,Typography}from'@mui/material';import sendEmail from'../utils/sendEmail';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Contact(){const[formData,setFormData]=useState({name:'',email:'',message:''});const handleChange=e=>{setFormData({...formData,[e.target.name]:e.target.value});};const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();await sendEmail(formData);alert("Email Sent Successfully!");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{marginTop:'2rem'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h3",gutterBottom:true,children:"Contact Me"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{fullWidth:true,margin:"normal",label:"Name",name:"name",onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{fullWidth:true,margin:"normal",label:"Email",name:"email",onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{fullWidth:true,margin:"normal",label:"Message",name:"message",multiline:true,rows:4,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{type:"submit",variant:"contained",color:"primary",sx:{marginTop:2},children:"Send"})]})]});}export default Contact;
